name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, OFFICE OF ATTORNEY GENERAL v. Larry A. COLBERT, Appellant

judges: Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, OFFICE OF ATTORNEY GENERAL v. Larry A. COLBERT, Appellant.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Appeal dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
LARSEN, J., dissents.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

attorneys: Ralph B. Pinskey, Harrisburg, for Larry A. Colbert.
Susan J. Forney, John G. Knorr, III, Calvin R. Koons, Harrisburg, for the Com.
casebody.head_matter:
619 A.2d 1062
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, OFFICE OF ATTORNEY GENERAL v. Larry A. COLBERT, Appellant.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Argued Jan. 29, 1993.
Decided Feb. 17, 1993.
Reargument Denied July 7, 1993.
Ralph B. Pinskey, Harrisburg, for Larry A. Colbert.
Susan J. Forney, John G. Knorr, III, Calvin R. Koons, Harrisburg, for the Com.
Before NIX, C.J., and LARSEN, FLAHERTY, ZAPPALA, PAPADAKOS, CAPPY and MONTEMURO, JJ.
